name: CMTextDisplayFlags
desc: An integer value that describes the display mode flags for text media.

items.name: var kCMTextDisplayFlag_scrollIn: CMTextDisplayFlags
items.desc: A flag that describes the text scrolls into the display region.

items.name: var kCMTextDisplayFlag_scrollOut: CMTextDisplayFlags
items.desc: A flag that describes the text scrolls out of the display region.

items.name: var kCMTextDisplayFlag_scrollDirectionMask: CMTextDisplayFlags
items.desc: A flag that describes the scrolling direction is set by a two-bit field, obtained from displayFlags using kCMTextDisplayFlag_scrollDirectionMask.

items.name: var kCMTextDisplayFlag_scrollDirection_bottomToTop: CMTextDisplayFlags
items.desc: A flag that describes the text is vertically scrolled up (“credits style”), entering from the bottom and leaving towards the top.

items.name: var kCMTextDisplayFlag_scrollDirection_rightToLeft: CMTextDisplayFlags
items.desc: A flag that describes the text is horizontally scrolled (“marquee style”), entering from the right and leaving towards the left.

items.name: var kCMTextDisplayFlag_scrollDirection_topToBottom: CMTextDisplayFlags
items.desc: A flag that describes the text is vertically scrolled down, entering from the top and leaving towards the bottom.

items.name: var kCMTextDisplayFlag_scrollDirection_leftToRight: CMTextDisplayFlags
items.desc: A flag that describes the text is horizontally scrolled, entering from the left and leaving towards the right.

items.name: var kCMTextDisplayFlag_continuousKaraoke: CMTextDisplayFlags
items.desc: A flag that describes enabling the continuous karaoke mode where the range of karaoke highlighting extends to include additional ranges rather than the highlighting moves onto the next range.

items.name: var kCMTextDisplayFlag_writeTextVertically: CMTextDisplayFlags
items.desc: A flag that describes the text renders vertically.

items.name: var kCMTextDisplayFlag_fillTextRegion: CMTextDisplayFlags
items.desc: A flag that describes the subtitle display bounds are to be filled with the color specified by kCMTextFormatDescriptionExtension_BackgroundColor.

items.name: var kCMTextDisplayFlag_forcedSubtitlesPresent: CMTextDisplayFlags
items.desc: A flag that describes forcing subtitles are present, for example, a subtitle which only displays during foreign language sections of the video. Check individual samples to determine what type of subtitle is contained.

items.name: var kCMTextDisplayFlag_allSubtitlesForced: CMTextDisplayFlags
items.desc: A flag that describes treating all subtitle samples as if they contain forced subtitles.
